TopicTitle: Action groups should be configurable in the flight scene

Articles.Content:
I would apreciate if i could either redefine the action group in space (what a mess after docking two crafts with different action groups on same keys)

or simple variant if i could show the defined action groups in space(during fly).

Thank you.

Lots of this.

I would like to add a new part to an existing action group to build a station from parts that acts like a whole.

And everything else that this would enable.
Yep, I was thinking about this when I planned to assemble a craft in orbit, and worrying that I wouldn't be able to configure the controls afterwards.
